mapper.update: update Board_tb set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select B.no, B.title, B.ctg_no, H.ctg_name, F.file_name_key, B.content, B.viewcnt, to_char(wrt_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as wrt_date, B.memberid from Board_tb B left outer join h_Category H on B.ctg_no = H.ctg_no left outer join Board_file F on B.no = F.no where B.no = #{no}
select count(B.no) from Board_tb B left outer join h_Category H on B.ctg_no = H.ctg_no where ctg_name = #{ctg_name}

select no, title, ctg_no, ctg_name, viewcnt, wrt_date, memberid from ( select B.no, B.title, B.ctg_no, H.ctg_name, B.viewcnt, wrt_date, B.memberid, row_number() over(order by no desc)as rNum from board_tb B join h_Category H on B.ctg_no = H.ctg_no) mb where rNum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by no desc
select count(no) from board_tb where no > 0
mapper.insert: insert into Board_tb(no, title, ctg_no, content, memberid) values(board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{ctg_no}, #{content}, #{memberid})
insert into Board_file(file_no, file_name_key, file_name, file_path, file_size, no) values(file_no_seq.nextval, #{file_name_key}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_size}, board_no.currval)

insert into Board_file(file_no, file_name_key, file_name, file_path, file_size, no) select file_no_seq.nextval, #{file_name_key}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_size}, b.no from Board_tb b left outer join Board_file f on b.no = f.no where B.no = #{no}
